settings.content:
CeramicSpeed is a leading high-end brand in the
cycling industry. We have a strong brand and are continuously working to
improve and strengthen our presence among cycling enthusiasts all over the world.
Due to exceptional growth globally, we are now
looking for a Strategic Account Manager to reinforce our
Colorado-based office and manage our North American distribution channel as
well as key dealer direct accounts.

The position

• As a Strategic Account Manager, we expect you to work independently within a team-based, diverse, fast-paced environment. You need to have the ability to build and maintain professional relationships, balance closing sales with customer satisfaction and communicate effectively in an international setting.

Your responsibilities will include:

• Manage North American distribution and key accounts.
• Collaborate with sales team, marketing and the product team to create sales programs, campaigns and events.
• Collect market feedback and trends to create and develop plans to drive growth.
• Develop annual forecasts and create seasonal sales plans.
• Provide customer service & product expertise.
• Event planning, support and travel.
• Sales order entry and backup support for customer service.

The Americas office is an
autonomous team that works collaboratively with our parent company in Denmark; consistantly
coordinating and aligning with each other as well as our Danish colleagues to
make sure no synergies are lost. 

To be successful in this position, it is important
that you enjoy and manage work independently within a collaborative framework.
It is important that you pay attention to details and are open-minded and curious to seek out and collaborate to
find solutions.

Your background

We expect that you have the following experience
and/or skills:

 • Excellent written and verbal communication, interpersonal, time management and prioritization skills
• Comfort with bike componentry and standards.
• Able to work efficiently and independently.
• Up to 25% travel, including some weekends.
• Intermediate/Advanced Microsoft Excel skills a plus.
• Spanish fluency a plus.
• Microsoft Dynamics 365 or other ERP experience a plus.

We offer 

An exciting position in a company
with a high growth rate and ambitions. You will be working together
with competent and passionate colleagues, in an informal organization. The
working place is 100% smoke free.    

The annual base salary range for this position is $65,000
- $80,000/year. Please note that the
salary information is a general guideline only. CeramicSpeed considers factors
such as (but not limited to) scope and responsibilities of the position,
candidate’s work experience, education/training, key skills, internal peer
equity, as well as market and business considerations when extending an offer. 

Benefits
include medical, dental and vision insurance, 5 weeks PTO plus 10 paid holidays,
profit sharing and a 5% 401(k) match as well as a Danish lunch and fruit scheme.
We are a rapidly growing company with huge potential for personal development.

Job starts after
agreement. Interviews are held continuously. The position is filled when
the right profile is found. Applications, including CV or resume, should be
sent via email to job@ceramicspeed.com. If you have any questions regarding the
position, you are welcome to contact Shauna Sadow at srs@ceramicspeed.com.

 About CeramicSpeed 

CeramicSpeed was established in 2004 and is today one
of the world's leading manufacturers of ceramic bearing products and optimised
racing chains for the cycling industry. We have more than 20 years of experience
in development of bearings which feature extremely low friction and an
unmatched lifetime. All our products are handmade in Denmark.   

 CeramicSpeed is a supplier to some of the world’s
largest and most prominent high-end bicycle manufacturers. Our products are
distributed in more than 50 countries, and we are the only bearing
manufacturer that sponsors 5 World Tour Teams as well as many of the world’s
best triathletes. 

The company also includes a branch that
manufactures and sells bearings for industrial applications.
